attributes.action: rethink the proposed abolition of taper relief
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I find it hard to adequately express the total contempt with which I hold the government with regard to the proposed abolition of taper relief.

Either Darling wants to destroy the small enterprise culture which has been flourishing in the UK, or more likely this is yet another pathetic knee jerk reaction against private equity headlines – not thought out at all and with huge unintended consequences

Either way you have lost my vote, and I despise you for your pathetic understanding of the  consequences of your proposal – yet another example of a minister not fit for the high office that he holds
